entry.title: Wipe Update
entry.text: + ESC Menu Guide updated. + Blocks will upgrade all the way up to Adamantite. + Learn by Doing weapons has been added. + Auto sort box added back. + Claim protector added. (Must be allied to interact if it's not your claim) + Radiated wasteland returns. + Working appliances added back. + Deco blocks back and fixed.

entry.title: Stability View
entry.text:
+ Stability View option has been added to the ESC menu for Donors.
+ If you logout with Stability View on, you must re-toggle to activate upon loging back in.

entry.title: Dew Collector
entry.text:
+ Dew Collectors can be upgraded, which will increase speed and amount of water WITH tools in.
+ REMOVE TOOLS BEFORE UPGRADING
+ Forged Bronze x10 -> Forged Tungsten x10 -> Forged Mithril x10 -> Forged Dwarvenite x10 -> Forged Adamantite x10
+ Vanilla: Speed x2 | Amount 2 Bronze: Speed x4 | Amount 3 Tungsten: Speed x8 | Amount 4 Mithril: Speed x16 | Amount 5 Dwarvenite: Speed x32 | Amount 6 Adamantite: Speed x64 | Amount 10

entry.title: Backpack
entry.text:
+ Due to issues with Donors unable to manage their important items in their backpack, the default backpack size has increased.
+ Previous slots: 91
+ New slots total: 104
+ Duration: Remainder of wipe at least

entry.title: More Traps Added
entry.text:
+ Better traps added
+ Fire and shock variant can be found by searching "trap" in recipes
+ All craft at a 1:1 ratio except logs, which craft 3 logs per
+ Traps unlocked at Advanced Engineering level 4

entry.title: Universal Tools and Map
entry.text:
+ Univseral Repair Kit Added
+ Universal Repair Kits can fully repair Universal Tools
+ 5 Universal Repair Kits can be craft at the cost of 1 Rough Pearl on the workbench
+ Live Map added to the links on the left

entry.title: Updated Guide UI
entry.text:
+ UI updated to allow for links in game.
+ UI updated to allow for announcement in game.
+ UI updated to allow for changelogs in game.

entry.title: Storage Improvements
entry.text:
+ Better storage beyond the Steel is now available
+ Goes all the way up to Adamantite level
+ Steel -> Bronze -> Tungsten -> Mithril -> Dwarvenite -> Adamantite

entry.title: Server Improvements
entry.text:
+ Upped Max Player Count by 5. Total players now 40, with additional 5 for staff.
+ Optimized some coding to reduce net packages.
+ Books will now scrap to crafting paper, in addition to magazines.

entry.title: Spawner Improvements
entry.text:
+ Quest Ticket Spawners fixed for 1.0
+ New visual effect added.
+ Increased performance with spawns via new method.

entry.title: Server Updated 1.0 EXP
entry.text:
With this, The Oasis enters 1.0 EXP and it's first full release after two full alphas. We have been through a lot. We have learned a lot. We have grown a lot. Here's to all of you who have been with us since the start. We are excited to continue to learn, grow, and have fun with old and new players alike.
Welcome to The Oasis 1.0 EXP!
